name: REFLECT
description: Reflects on the current state of a mission to evaluate progress and determine next steps.

inputDefinitions.name: plan_history
inputDefinitions.description: A JSON string representing the list of executed steps, their status, and parameters.

inputDefinitions.name: work_products
inputDefinitions.description: A JSON string representing a manifest of data artifacts created by the plan.

inputDefinitions.name: question
inputDefinitions.description: The specific question to reflect on.

outputDefinitions.name: answer
outputDefinitions.description: A direct answer to the reflection question.

outputDefinitions.name: plan
outputDefinitions.description: A new plan of steps to continue the mission.
